nodes.text: The Scarlet Sword, also known simply as the Sword, was a cantina in Livien Magnus' Commerce District from which spacer often bought drinks. It was owned by a woman named Gerro.
The entrance to the Scarlet Sword was marked by a large red sign. The cantina was in a state of disrepair, and was known to have disreputable patrons.

During the Galactic Civil War, the cantina was the base of the Ord Radama Rebel Cell on Ord Radama. Each night, multiple Rebel agents would enter the bar and pretend to be drunk, while actually gathering information.
